properties.name: kin.rsocket.broker.auth
properties.description: rsocket broker是否对request进行权限校验

properties.name: kin.rsocket.broker.externalDomain
properties.description: external domain for requester from external

properties.name: kin.rsocket.broker.upstreamToken
properties.description: remote rsocket broker token, 支持文件路径配置

properties.name: kin.rsocket.broker.ssl.enabled
properties.description: 是否开启rsocket broker connection ssl

properties.name: kin.rsocket.broker.ssl.keyStoreType
properties.description: rsocket broker connection ssl key store type

properties.name: kin.rsocket.broker.ssl.keyStore
properties.description: rsocket broker connection ssl key store文件

properties.name: kin.rsocket.broker.ssl.keyStorePassword
properties.description: rsocket broker connection ssl key store password

properties.name: kin.rsocket.broker.router
properties.description: rsocket broker consumer请求路由规则
